text: wla yznn aladhin yabkhalun bima 'aneam allah bih ealayhim tfdla minh 'an hdha albkhl khayr lhm, bal hu shrr lhm; li'ana hdha almal aldhy jmewh sayakun twqana min naar yudae fi 'aenaqihim yawm alqyam. wallah subhanah wteala hu malik almaliki, wahu albaqi baed fna' jmye khlqh, wahu khabir baemalkm jmyeha, wsyjazy kulaaan ealaa qadr asthqaqh
